column5: What would be an estimated wait time at the Ft Frances crossing on a friday morning? Any feedback would be nice. Thanks Joe
Just guessing but I would say less than 15 minutes.
Shouldn't be a problem. If you really want smooth sailing...cross at 6:45am when they all want to go home after their shift ends at 7 am. Fridays aren't generally a problem.
Friday should be smooth sailing, very little wait time.
At this time of the summer, I am guessing 15 minutes on a friday morning would be a long wait. Shouldn't have any issue.
We do a Friday departure from our outfitter and cross between 8:30 and 10:00 am.... never wait more than 5 mins..... it goes really smooth...
Ditto, Joeman79! We normally cross about noon on Friday and have had little wait in the last 15 plus years. Always best to avoid weekends if you can.
We went through 2 weeks ago on a Saturday morning at about 8am and there was about a 5 minute wait. I would assume Friday would be about the same.
